title: Well-Met
description: In good circumstances, keep your life together.

title: Expertise
description: Do everyday work that falls within your competencies.

title: Organization
description: Bring diligence, attention and organization to bear.

title: Greater Well-Met
description: Keep your life together, even in difficult situations.

title: Greater Function
description: Perform basic tasks with flair and verve.

title: Greater Focus
description: Deeply focused attention, or paying attention in unfavorable scenarios.
